document_data.name: House of the Waves
document_data.mainbody: '''House of the Waves''' was a temple dedicated to [[Trishina]] in the [[aquatic elf]] city of [[Myth Nantar]].
document_data.Location: This temple stood along [[Chamal Avenue]], in the [[Myth Nantar/Elves Quarter|Elves Quarter]] of Myth Nantar. Like all temples in Myth Nantar, there was a {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} perimeter around the building that was free of [[coral]]. The coral that grew around this boundary, which was clearly defined as if moving around a force field, was always as smooth as [[silk]].<ref>
document_data.Structure: This temple stood two stories tall.
